amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration's Operations and Research account by $6.7 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding (by offsets) for the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration Operations and Research by $6,700,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bean amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 234 - 190 (Roll no. 264).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Ms. Bean.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
